NewsItem.HEADLINE: RAN Expert INSIGHT 2017.3 Cable+Mobile
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This strategic report investigates the crossover between cable networks and mobile networks. How can cable networks be used as backhaul for small cells?
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report includes technical analysis of how cable networks can be used for backhaul or fronthaul, as well as analysis of the business models and barriers between cable and mobile operators that prevent cooperation from occurring widely.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: WiMAX WiFI FWA LTE 5G NR 5GNR fixed wireless access cable mobile wisp market research forecast cpe cost to connect cost to pass mvno
